simplesect.para: This document exists to answer questions about what PROS is and its general use. For more coding-specific help, visit Coding FAQ
This document is in progress, we will be adding content as we're asked pertinent questions.

sect2.title: Does PROS have a graphics library for the Brain's Screen?
sect2.para: Yes, we have ported LVGL for use with the V5 Brain. You can find documentation for it on the LVGL site.
